amendment.description: To authorize the disposal of ferromanganese from the National Defense Stockpile.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2547 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2547 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Byrd. (consideration: CR S12778-12791; text: CR S12785) To authorize the disposal of ferromanganese from the National Defense Stockpile.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2547 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2547 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Byrd.
